rows.label: tlk45350251_02_msg0001
rows.name:
A terrible thing happened recently...
The budget for our agricultural
research was reduced!

rows.label: tlk45350251_02_msg0002
rows.name:
You may already know this, but
Superbia's most valuable business
by far is the salvaging trade.

rows.label: tlk45350251_02_msg0003
rows.name:
We use salvaged metals and machinery
to drive our military, and we refine
them for export to other nations.

rows.label: tlk45350251_02_msg0004
rows.name:
The downside of this is that when
the salvaging trade suffers, so does
our national economy.

rows.label: tlk45350251_02_msg0005
rows.name:
And I hear pickings were awfully slim
during the last fiscal year.

rows.label: tlk45350251_02_msg0006
rows.name:
Even so...I wish they wouldn't choose
our budget to slash. This research may
be exactly what Superbia needs!
